useCase.name: Manage Book Categories
useCase.description: Manager selects "Manage Book Categories" in the UI, deletes categories, and receives success or error messages.

failureEndConditions.condition: Access denied or error message displayed

useCase.trigger: User selects "Manage Book Categories" in the UI

mainSequence.step: Manager selects "Manage Book Categories" in the UI
Access to manage book categories granted
Book categories are displayed to the Manager
Request for category deletion is sent
Category records are deleted from the database
Confirmation of deletion received from the database
Success message displayed to the Manager
